Stop Tailpiece. Machine Heads GOTOH Japan. Color Black. Weight About 9.77 Pound ( 4.43 Kg ). This is Used Guitar. The Pickups has been changed. Therefore, I changed all electric circuits to New ones. It is 4 Pots and 3way toggle switch and Output jack and Capacitor and Wiring. The hard case have Six hinges. One of them is broken. I was shooting a lot of photos. Please confirm with a photograph. It was manufactured in late 1980s ~ early 1990s. Although it is an old guitar, I think that the scratch is little. I feel that the previous owner cherished this guitar. It keeps a very good++ condition. The better the deterioration of the metal parts, it is just vintage guitar. This is a so-called " Black beauty ", All Mahogany's Les paul custom type by Burny. Japanese old guitar uses High quality wood. Thanks to that, Un plugged sound is be powerful. Making is very polite. I am always fascinated by the black beauty Les Paul. About guitar play, Current state, the space between the strings and the frets is standard. The accuracy of the product is high. It is sure thing that the pickups has been changed. I think this pickups is Nisshin-onpa japan. I feel a good Over drive and a good Distortion sound. Of course, the clean sound is also wonderful. Let's enjoy Vintage Burny !! It is cleanliness. I polished with guitar exclusive polish, so it is in a very clean state. I after the finger board cleaning, painted beeswax. The aim is moisturizing and and protection. Current neck condition, very good ! roughly straight ! There is no problem with the Truss rod and it can be adjusted. Remaining the frets are 88% on average. You can play immediately after it is delivered to you. I was set new strings. Regular tuning. ( Inch : 009, 011, 016, 024, 032, 042 ) All is working well.
